title: ISic003435. I.Sicily inscription 003435
body:
1 |1 [--- Αἰ]σχρίωνα καὶ Νυ |2 μφόδωρο[ν] |4 Βομβυλίνου

1 |1 [---..]ΣΧΡΙΩΝΑΚΑΙΝΥ |2 ΜΦΟΔΩΡΟ[.] |4 ΒΟΜΒΥΛΙΝΟΥ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Manganaro 1999, based upon antiquarian record itself reported by Orsi

Italian translation

Maria Barbieri

Escriona e Ninfodoro, figli di Bombulino

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Aeschrion and Nymphodoros, sons of Bombylinos

commentary

Orsi instead proposed restoring in a different order and with different inflections, as Βομβυλίνος, Χριῶνα καὶ Νυμφόδωρος

bibliography

  • 49.1308.B https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Tamburino Merlini 1841 189 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002231
  • Orsi 1900 56 no.30-32 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001707
  • Messina 1992 146-147 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001750
  • Manganaro 1999 42 no.19 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001813
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
